articles.author: David Martin, Eleanor Watson
articles.title: Pentagon considers sending contingent of troops to Port Sudan to help remaining American citizens amid war - CBS News
articles.description: After evacuating U.S. diplomats and their families over the weekend, the Pentagon is examining options to help the remaining U.S. citizens in Sudan who wish to leave.
articles.content:
Washington — The U.S. is considering sending a contingent of troops to Port Sudan to coordinate the departure of American citizens seeking to leave Sudan, U.S. officials told CBS News Monday.

articles.title: American television host and political commentator Tucker Carlson quits Fox News in a surprise exit - OpIndia
articles.description: Tucker Carlson rose to prominence in the American media landscape with his acerbic commentary on 'Tucker Carlson Tonight' show on Fox News. | OpIndia News
articles.content:
In a sudden and unexpected departure, Tucker Carlson, the host with the highest primetime viewership on Fox News Channel, will be parting ways with the network.
